Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.support

Class EntityViewPageHelper

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.support.EntityViewPageHelper
@Service public class EntityViewPageHelper extends Object
Helper for adding messages to the PageContentStructure for a particular EntityViewRequest. Messages will be resolved against the configured EntityMessages and will always get the EntityViewContext.getEntityLabel() as the first argument.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme

  • Method Details

    • addGlobalFeedbackAfterRedirect

      @Deprecated public void addGlobalFeedbackAfterRedirect(@NonNull @NonNull EntityViewRequest viewRequest, @NonNull @NonNull Style feedbackStyle, @NonNull @NonNull String messageCode)
      Deprecated.
      use addGlobalFeedbackMessageAfterRedirect(EntityViewRequest, Style, String) with full message
      Registers a feedback message that should be shown after redirect. The attribute will always be registered in the flash map. The message codes will be resolved and registered with their specified style as model attribute GlobalPageFeedbackViewProcessor.FEEDBACK_ATTRIBUTE_KEY.

      Only support message codes, use together with GlobalPageFeedbackViewProcessor.

      Parameters:
      viewRequest - view being requested
      feedbackStyle - style for the feedback message
      messageCode - that should be resolved when rendering the message

    • addGlobalFeedbackMessageAfterRedirect

      public void addGlobalFeedbackMessageAfterRedirect(@NonNull @NonNull EntityViewRequest viewRequest, @NonNull @NonNull Style feedbackStyle, @NonNull @NonNull String message)

    • throwOrAddExceptionFeedback

      public void throwOrAddExceptionFeedback(EntityViewRequest viewRequest, String messageCode, Throwable exception)
      Throws an exception in development mode, else registers it as an exception on the BindingResult if there is one attached to the EntityViewRequest. This assumes that binding result errors will be displayed.

      For now, the exception is also added as global feedback message, but this behaviour is expected to change in a future release.

      Parameters:
      viewRequest - to which to add the message
      messageCode - for the message
      exception - that was thrown

    • addExceptionFeedback

      public void addExceptionFeedback(EntityViewRequest viewRequest, String messageCode, Throwable exception)
